  • Classes in peril.views.slick.components used by peril.views.slick 
    Class and Description
    TextField
    This object is a visual component that can be used to display a block of text on the screen.
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.components used by peril.views.slick.components 
    Class and Description
    Component
    Defines the default behaviour of a visual component that can be initialised and drawn.
    MiniMap.Window
    Models a window that pans around the MiniMap.
    ScrollBar.Slider
    The slider that appears on the ScrollBar.
    VisualList.Element
    An element of the VisualList that can be displayed on screen using VisualList.Element.draw(Frame, Font, int).
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.components used by peril.views.slick.components.menus 
    Class and Description
    Component
    Defines the default behaviour of a visual component that can be initialised and drawn.
    TextField
    This object is a visual component that can be used to display a block of text on the screen.
    VisualList
    Encapsulates the behaviours a List of VisualList.Elements that can be displayed on screen and clicked on screen.
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.components used by peril.views.slick.states 
    Class and Description
    Component
    Defines the default behaviour of a visual component that can be initialised and drawn.
    ProgressBar
    Encapsulates the behaviours of a progress bar that can be displayed on screen.
    ScrollBar
    Encapsulates the behaviour of a ScrollBar.
    TextField
    This object is a visual component that can be used to display a block of text on the screen.
    VisualList
    Encapsulates the behaviours a List of VisualList.Elements that can be displayed on screen and clicked on screen.
  • Classes in peril.views.slick.components used by peril.views.slick.states.gameStates 
    Class and Description
    MiniMap
    This class models a MiniMap that will display the entirety of the ModelBoard and will allow the user to move around their view of the ModelBoard.
